attributes.action: Teaching children and teens manners in schools
attributes.additional_details:
British etiquette is dying and more and more people are becoming rude and ungrateful.

For society to continue, people must treat others with respect and equality and to do this, they must know how to do this.

Learning how to eat, talk and behave will help young people go far in their careers with pleased employers and in the social aspects of their lives with much respect from many people
